availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County farmer. Kentucky native. Married Sarah C. Newell. Father of Robert J. Newell, Hugh Newell, Elijah Newell, and Sarilda Newell.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District 1, p. 365. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton, Falmouth, p. 22. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky, Sixth Congressional District, Pendleton County, 1863, p. 176. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton, Falmouth, p. 16. “William S Newell,” Find A Grave, May 22, 2009, memorial no. 37365845.
